#sidebar TOC

= List Parameters =

List parameters available to all list [Resources resources].

|| *Name*  || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| page    || int    || page number of the result set. (optional, default: `1`, max: `10`) ||
|| perpage || int    || limit number of results per page. (optional, default: `10`, max: `50`) ||

== Examples: ==
{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/search.json?q=New+York&page=2
}}}

This query will fetch the second page of a search for "New York" and return a json object.

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/search.json?q=New+York&perpage=25
}}}

This query will fetch the first 25 results of a search for "New York" and return a json object.
